commentBody:
I confess I was so dejected by the last two games that I didn't have confidence they could come back. I remained nervous throughout the game, half expecting them to do something stupid, like they did at Miami. Of course they were missing half their players in that game which I knew intellectually, but even so it's hard to watch bad football from the Pats even though I for Belichik for the lousy game plan.

The last thing I would venture to do is to say they are going to go to the Super Bowl. In the words of the famous Bill Belichik, it's one game at a time and one play at a time.

They did play great though, and so did the Chiefs although time management is hardly their forte.
